text:
After four days of lacklustre performance, #US #stocks rebounded as more encouraging news around #COVID19 #vaccine & potential agreement on the #stimulus talks emerged.
*$DJIA climbed 1.13%
*$SPX jumped 1.29%
*$NASDAQ surged 1.25%
*$GOLD gained 1.44%
Losses may exceed deposits https://t.co/xibJQN8E7U
